thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Renewable Japan Energy Infrastructure Fund to issue 1,332 units to SMBC Nikko Securities

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Renewable Japan Energy Infrastructure Fund to issue 1,332 units to SMBC Nikko Securities

organizations.name: renewable japan energy infrastructure fund inc

text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Renewable Japan Energy Infrastructure Fund Inc
* Says it confirmed that it will issue 1,332 units with the paid-in price of 99,484 yen per unit, or for 132.5 million yen in total, through private placement to SMBC Nikko Securities Inc.
* Subscription date on March 9 and payment date on March 12
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/D2DGSh
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
